string-array.name: sentences
string-array.item: It was always dangerous to drive with him since he insisted the safety cones were a slalom course.
Plans for this weekend include turning wine into water
He set out for a short walk, but now all he could see were mangroves and water were for miles.
He didnt heed the warning and it had turned out surprisingly well.
The efficiency we have at removing trash has made creating trash more acceptable.
Cats are good pets, for they are clean and are not noisy.
It had been sixteen days since the zombies first attacked.
